item.title: Getting started
item.description: Installation Installing basic CLI tools There are a few tools that are essential to development, especially when working with kubernetes. These include: kubectl, gcloud, and helm. Hugo itself is just a single binary without dependencies on expensive runtimes like Ruby, Python or PHP and without dependencies on any databases. You just need to download the latest version. For more information read the official installation guides. Let’s make sure Hugo is set up as expected.
